enumoption.shortdesc: Specifies that the month and year should be displayed.
Specifies that three letter day descriptions should be present.
Prevents the user from switching months with the calendar.
Displays each week numbers of the current year, down the left side of the calendar
Starts the calendar week on Monday, instead of the default Sunday
Denotes that a cell of an instance of GtkCList should not contain anything.
Denotes a cell of an instance of GtkCList should contain text.
Denotes a cell of an instance of GtkCList should contain a pixel map.
Denotes a cell of an instance of GtkCList should contain text and a pixelmap.
Support for a GtkClist containing a widget has not been completed in GTK+, therefore it is not currently available in PHP-GTK itself.
Denotes that an instance of GtkCList will ignore mouse button events.
Denotes that an instance of GtkCList will react to select mouse events.
Denotes that an instance of GtkCList will react to drag mouse button events.
Denotes that an instance of GtkCList will react to expand mouse button events.
Specifies the new GtkCTree node to be placed as a sibling of the specified node, just before it.
Specifies the new GtkCTree node to be placed as a child of the specified node.
Specifies the new GtkCTree node to be placed as a sibling of the specified node, just after it.
Denotes there should be no lines between the nodes on this instance of GtkCTree.
Denotes that the lines between the nodes in this instance of GtkCTree should be solid.
Denotes that the lines between the nodes in this instance of GtkCTree should be dotted lines.
Denotes that the lines between the nodes in this instance of GtkCTree should be tabs rather than lines.
Denotes that this instance of the GtkCTree should have no visible expanders.
Denotes that this instance of the GtkCTree should have square expanders.
Denotes that this instance of the GtkCTree should have triangular expanders.
Denotes that this instance of the GtkCTree should have circular expanders.
Tells PHP-GTK to expand the current node of this instance of GtkCTree.
Tells PHP-GTK to expand the current node, and all nodes below it in this instance of the GtkCTree class.
Tells PHP-GTK to collapse the current node of this instance of GtkCTree.
Tells PHP-GTK to collapse the current node, and all nodes below it in this instance of the GtkCTree class.
Tells PHP-GTK to toggle the current node of this instance of GtkCTree, this will cause an expanded node to collapse and a collapsed node to expand.
Tells PHP-GTK to toggle the current node, and all nodes below it in this instance of the GtkCTree class, this will cause an expanded node to collapse and a collapsed node to expand.
Instructs PHP-GTK to show bitmap fonts when calling GtkFontSelection::set_filter or GtkFontSelectionDialog::set_filter.
Instructs PHP-GTK to show scaleable fonts when calling GtkFontSelection::set_filter or GtkFontSelectionDialog::set_filter.
Instructs PHP-GTK to show scaleable bitmap fonts when calling GtkFontSelection::set_filter or GtkFontSelectionDialog::set_filter.
Instructs PHP-GTK to show any font that matches any of the above flags when calling GtkFontSelection::set_filter or GtkFontSelectionDialog::set_filter.
Tells PHP-GTK not to allow the user to change the filter via the Filters page of the GtkFontSelection class.
Tells PHP-GTK to allow the user to change the filter via the Filters page of the GtkFontSelection class.
Denotes that the directional movement within the menu should be to the parent menu shell.
Denotes that the directional movement within the menu should be to the submenu of this item, if there is one available.
Denotes that the directional movement within the menu should be to the next menu item.
Denotes that the directional movement within the menu should be to the previous menu item.
The object has been destroyed and is processing any shutdown callbacks required.
The object is not contained within another object.
There are signals which are connected to this object.
The object has undergone its construction process and is ready to be used.
